Package model

Class Board

java.lang.Object
model.Board
public class Board extends Object
This class contains all the logic of the board and how it's designed.

  • Constructor Details

    • Board

      public Board()
      The constructor that creates the board object.

  • Method Details

    • generateBoard

      public void generateBoard()
      This is a method that generates the fields inside the board object containing EMPTY balls.

    • setBoard

      public void setBoard​(String board)
      This method sets the board to a specified board by using strings.
      Parameters:
      board - is a String that represents the board.

    • getSubBoard

      public Balls[][] getSubBoard​(int subboard)
      This method returns a 3 by 3 subBoard based on the input.
      Parameters:
      subboard - a number from 0 to 7.
      Returns:
      Balls[3][3] of the subBoard asked.

    • setSubBoard

      public void setSubBoard​(int quadrant, Balls[][] subBoard)
      This method sets the values of the board to the new values of the passed Balls[][] object and giving the quadrant to be replaced.
      Parameters:
      quadrant - a number from 0 to 7. Choosing the subBoard.
      subBoard - The Balls[3][3] we want to set inside the board.

    • rotate

      public void rotate​(int direction)
      This method rotates the array of balls depending on the direction. Clockwise or Counter-Clockwise.
      Parameters:
      direction - 1 or 0 for ClockWise and CounterClockwise respectively.

    • isWinner

      public boolean isWinner​(Balls ball)
      This method checks for the current player and his row and col values from the last move made in 4 directions up left.
      Returns:
      the current player if he won the game or null if he did not.

    • count

      public int count​(Balls ball, int row, int col, int dirX, int dirY)
      This method counts the number of balls in a row for the current player.
      Parameters:
      row - this is the value of the last move's row
      col - this is the value of the last move's col
      dirX - this is the direction in which to look for balls
      dirY - this is the direction in which to look for balls
      Returns:
      a value between 0 and 6 which is the number of balls in a line.

    • boardIsFull

      public boolean boardIsFull()
      This method checks weather the board has no more space available.
      Returns:
      true if the board is NOT full otherwise false

    • fiveInARow

      public boolean fiveInARow()
      This method checks weather any player has 5 balls in a row.
      Returns:
      true if there is a winner or false otherwise.

    • move

      public void move​(int move, Balls ball)
      This method places the marble on the board based on the move.
      Parameters:
      move - the index of the square.

    • copy

      public Balls[][] copy()
      Basic copy method.
      Returns:
      a Ball array that is the copy of the board.

      public void setFields​(Balls[][] fields)
